verses.text: \w About|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w left|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H3063"\w* settled \w near|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Hirah|strong="H2437"\w*, \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w Adullamite|strong="H5726"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Shua|strong="H7770"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H3063"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w and|strong="H3063"\w* slept \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Judah \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Er|strong="H6147"\w*.

\w Again|strong="H5750"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* Onan.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Shelah|strong="H7956"\w*; \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w Chezib|strong="H3580"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w acquired|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w Er|strong="H6147"\w*, \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w Er|strong="H6147"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*’s \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* said \w to|strong="H6965"\w* Onan, “Sleep \w with|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H6965"\w* \w brother|strong="H2992"\w*’s wife. \w Perform|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H6965"\w* \w duty|strong="H2992"\w* \w as|strong="H3063"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* \w brother-in-law|strong="H2992"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H6965"\w* \w brother|strong="H2992"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Onan \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*; \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* would sleep \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* brother’s wife, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* would spill \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w produce|strong="H1961"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* brother.

\w What|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7489"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* Onan \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w well|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*, “\w Live|strong="H3427"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* widow \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shelah|strong="H7956"\w* \w grows|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* thought, “\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w*, \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6435"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w her|strong="H3618"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*’s wife, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Shua|strong="H7770"\w*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. \w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* finished \w mourning|strong="H5162"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w Hirah|strong="H2437"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Adullamite|strong="H5726"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sheepshearers|strong="H1494"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Timnah|strong="H8553"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5927"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w was|strong="H6629"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H5046"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2524"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Timnah|strong="H8553"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w shear|strong="H1494"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*,”

\w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* widow’s garments, \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w veil|strong="H6809"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* disguise \w herself|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Enaim|strong="H5879"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Timnah|strong="H8553"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w although|strong="H3588"\w* \w Shelah|strong="H7956"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w grown|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* realizing \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* went \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* said, “\w Come|strong="H3051"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* sleep \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.” “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* sleeping \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*?” \w she|strong="H1931"\w* inquired.

“\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*,” Judah answered. But \w she|strong="H5704"\w* replied, “\w Only|strong="H5704"\w* if \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w leave|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* something \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pledge|strong="H6162"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w pledge|strong="H6162"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*?” \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. \w She|strong="H4100"\w* answered, “\w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w seal|strong="H2368"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w cord|strong="H6616"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* slept \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w she|strong="H4100"\w* became \w pregnant|strong="H2029"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* Tamar \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w* \w veil|strong="H6809"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w* widow’s garments \w again|strong="H6965"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w Hirah|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Adullamite|strong="H5726"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w collect|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* items \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w left|strong="H4672"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* woman, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* men \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H4725"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shrine prostitute \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Enaim|strong="H5879"\w*?” “\w No|strong="H3808"\w* shrine prostitute \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3808"\w* answered.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* Hirah \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w could|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w her|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w furthermore|strong="H1571"\w*, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* men \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* said, ‘\w No|strong="H3808"\w* shrine prostitute \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*.’”

“\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w keep|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* items,” \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* replied. “\w Otherwise|strong="H6435"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* laughingstock. \w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H7971"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w did|strong="H3063"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goat|strong="H1423"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w About|strong="H1961"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H1961"\w* \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w prostituted|strong="H2181"\w* herself, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H2320"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2030"\w*.” “\w Bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*!” \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* replied. “\w Let|strong="H5046"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* death!”

\w As|strong="H3318"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* being \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, Tamar \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* message \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2524"\w*: “\w I|strong="H3318"\w* am \w pregnant|strong="H2030"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* man \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w* items belong.” \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* added, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w examine|strong="H5234"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*. \w Whose|strong="H4310"\w* seal \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w cord|strong="H6616"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w*?”

\w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w recognized|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* items \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w*, “\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shelah|strong="H7956"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w relations|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H6256"\w* Tamar \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w twins|strong="H8380"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w* womb.
